official_title: A bill entitled the Fort Douglas Historical Preservation Act of 1980.
short_title: Fort Douglas Historical Preservation Act of 1980

summary.text: Fort Douglas Historical Preservation Act of 1980 - Transfers Fort Douglas in Salt Lake City, Utah, to the jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Interior, subject to the use of those lands needed for reserve activities and military family housing.

titles.title: Fort Douglas Historical Preservation Act of 1980
A bill entitled the Fort Douglas Historical Preservation Act of 1980.
